name: AJ Fernandez - San Lotano - Requiem Habano - Churchill
brand: AJ Fernandez, San Lotano, Requiem Habano
additionalNotes: This is a flavorful full-bodied cigar that offers spicy and coffee notes. Its Brazilian Habano wrapper covers a Nicaraguan binder and a filler from Honduras, Nicaragua and the Dominican Republic. This exquisite blend was created by AJ Fernandez, a third generation Cuban cigar crafter who resurrected his grandfatherâ€™s brand. The San Lotano Requiem Habano Gran Toro is handmade in Nicaragua.
